metadata.name: "Slo Down (Chill Out Version)" by Hibikilla
metadata.description:
# Description

新進気鋭のクリエイター集団Medical Tempoが2021年にプロデュースしたHibikilla "Slo Down" を大阪在住のビートメイカーToyopita WhichがLo-Fi hip hop的アプローチでRemix。  
音楽の癒しを静かにBurn it!

Hibikilla's "Slo Down" that is produced by Medical Tempo is now remixed by Osaka-based producer Toyopita Which with a lo-fi hip hop vibes.  
We still burn it for musical meditations!
